title: 8. Self Forgiveness as a Form of Self care (Part 1)
itunes:title: Self Forgiveness as a Form of Self care (Part 1)
description:
Hey girl hey!

 

This week we get into self forgiveness as a form of self care. We tend to think of self care of being an external activity but tune in to this episode to discover why looking within is also a MAJOR contributor to self care. This is the first of a three part series!

 

Click here for a preview of my e-book the 3-step Guide to Radical Self Forgiveness

 

Don't forget to rate review & subscribe!

 

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
